name: mr-football-dynasty
description: Mr. Football Dynasty â€” Browser-based football management simulation

scripts.build:playable: npm run sync:legacy-assets && npm run build && npm run verify:playable-build
scripts.verify:playable: npm run build:playable && npm run playable:smoke
scripts.verify:contracts: node scripts/verify-contracts.mjs --fixtures tests/fixtures/contracts --actual dist/contracts-actual.json --mode optional --report dist/contracts-report.json --markdown dist/contracts-report.md
scripts.verify:hybrid: npm run verify:playable && npm run verify:legacy-save && node scripts/ci/retry-once.mjs --cmd "npm run smoke:legacy-session" --attempts 2 && npm run verify:save-import && npm run report:hybrid-metrics && npm run report:playability
scripts.verify:lane: node scripts/verify-no-gameplay-delta.mjs --strict-lane --lane codex-hybrid-v4 --shared-window-profile closed --report dist/lane-report.json --shared-audit dist/shared-window-audit.json
scripts.verify:lane:codex: node scripts/verify-no-gameplay-delta.mjs --strict-lane --lane codex-hybrid-v4 --shared-window-profile closed --report dist/lane-report-codex.json --shared-audit dist/shared-window-audit-codex.json
scripts.verify:lane:claude: node scripts/verify-no-gameplay-delta.mjs --strict-lane --lane claude-gameplay-v4 --shared-window-profile closed --report dist/lane-report-claude.json --shared-audit dist/shared-window-audit-claude.json
scripts.build:verify-preload: npm run build && npm run verify-preload
scripts.build:profile: npm run build && npm run profile:dist
scripts.verify:all: npm test && npm run build && npm run verify-preload && npm run profile:dist && npm run verify:hybrid && npm run verify:security
scripts.ci:local: npm run verify:toolchain && npm test && npm run build && npm run verify-preload && npm run profile:dist && npm run verify:hybrid && npm run e2e:launcher && npm run verify:security && npm run verify:perf && npm run verify:contracts
scripts.ci:release-candidate: npm run verify:toolchain && npm test && npm run build && npm run verify-preload && npm run profile:dist && npm run verify:hybrid && npm run e2e:launcher && npm run verify:perf && npm run verify:contracts && npm run verify:security && npm run verify:rc-checklist && npm run verify:rollback-dry
